institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-led youth customized training business operation rules/Article 28 (Application and support for training costs)
contents: Article 28 (Application and support for training costs) ① The chairman may support training costs to the joint training center in accordance with Article 22. ② The Chairman may delegate the task of paying training costs under Paragraph 1 to a branch or branch office of the Corporation. ③ If the joint training center wishes to receive support for training costs pursuant to paragraph 1, the training costs of the training course completed in the relevant unit period (if the training period is more than 3 months, includes the training costs incurred in the training course conducted in the relevant unit period) Application must be made to the branch or branch office under the jurisdiction of the Corporation. ④ Applications for training costs for training courses from partner training institutions are handled by the joint training center. ⑤ The chairman may request or recover training fees paid in error or excessively to the joint training center.
